channel.title: Castle wars. [PI]
channel.description: Ok so I am remaking castle wars from scratch and it seems the only part I am stuck on is where a team cape is given to the player. What I mean by this is, lets say a player picks saradomin for a team. You go into the saradomin portal and the saradomin cloak gets equipped to the player and the player cannot take it off, I am looking for a code to do this. I have ben searching all over for this code, I've also tried ripping it from multiple castle wars mingames and i've come up with nothing... I've tried scripting my own code for this and it didn't work either, so please help.

item.title: Castle wars. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

I do not understand that bit of code you posted at all, if I wanted an item added to the player id have it added like this
c.getItems().addItem(10010, 1);

but what I am looking for is where the item is equipped to the player and the player cannot take it off.
That is the bit of coding I am looking for. Still in need of help so please do.

Read full topic
